name: shorts-deflector
description: Seamlessly play YouTube Shorts with the normal desktop interface.
author: Attituding <attituding@outlook.com>

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run tailwindcss && npm run typescript && npm run zip
scripts.clear: (if exist dist rmdir dist /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\resources rmdir src\vendors\chromium\_locales /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\firefox\resources rmdir src\vendors\firefox\_locales /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\resources rmdir src\vendors\chromium\assets /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\firefox\resources rmdir src\vendors\firefox\assets /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\resources rmdir src\vendors\chromium\index.html /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\firefox\resources rmdir src\vendors\firefox\index.html /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\resources rmdir src\vendors\chromium\etRequestRule.json /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\firefox\resources rmdir src\vendors\firefox\etRequestRule.json /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\resources rmdir src\vendors\chromium\resources /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\firefox\resources rmdir src\vendors\firefox\resources /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\chromium\scripts rmdir src\vendors\chromium\scripts /s /q) && (if exist src\vendors\firefox\scripts rmdir src\vendors\firefox\scripts /s /q)
scripts.zip: (if not exist dist mkdir dist) && cd src/vendors/chromium && 7z a -tzip ../../../dist/chromium.zip * && cd ../firefox && 7z a -tzip ../../../dist/firefox.zip *
